He explained: After the show it was fun. Especially Simon Cowell 's dressing room. You never knew what to expect when you walked in- it could be a party. "I think the judges should be able to opt out. I think it stinks when you have to choose between your own acts- I wouldn't do it if I were them. Cheryl Cole wasn't the first to opt out- Sharon once walked off the show for about five minutes. " Simon Cowell has the best guests. ( Reuters)- Chrysler is working to refinance what its chief executive characterized as "shyster loans" that the Barack Obama administration extended as part of a bailout to keep the automaker from collapse in 2009. I want to pay back the shyster loans, Sergio Marchionne said at an industry conference, using a derogatory term for an unprincipled lawyer or politician. "Pay back the loans, get those out and then take( the company) public." Sergio Marchionne
